部门管理¶

创建部门¶

class dingtalk.contact.Department[source]¶
create(name, parent_id=1, **kwargs)[source]¶

create a department.

Parameters:
  • name – department name
  • parent_id – parent department id, default 1 root department.
  • hide_dept – whether hide the department
  • dept_permits – who can view the department, limit 200 departments.
  • user_permits – who can view the department, limit 200 persons.
  • outer_dept – restrict members of this department from viewing the address book.
  • outer_dept_only_self – whether members of this department can only see the address book of their department and subordinate departments
  • outer_permit_users – specify the userid list of address book users that the members of this department can view, the total cannot exceed 200
  • outer_permit_depts – specify a list of department IDs in the address book that members of this department can view, the total number cannot exceed 200
  • create_dept_group – whether to create an enterprise group associated with this department
  • order – for the sort value in the parent department, the lower order value is sorted first
  • source_identifier – department identification field, developers can use this field to uniquely identify a department and map it with the department in the external address book of DingDing
Return dept_id:

deparment id of new created department.
delete(dept_id)[source]¶

delete department

Parameters:dept_id – department id which is going to be deleted.

:return True

get(dept_id=None, lang=None)[source]¶

get department list

Parameters:
  • dept_id – int id of department, get all departments if dept_id is None
  • lang – language of contacts
Return result:

list of departments
get_children(dept_id)[source]¶

get childen of the department.

param dept_id:department id
return departments:
 id list of children deparments
get_info(dept_id, lang=None)[source]¶

get detail infos of department.

Parameters:
  • dept_id – department id
  • lang – language of department.
Return result:

department infos.
get_parents(dept_id)[source]¶

get parents of one department.

Parameters:
  • dept_id – id of department
  • parent_id_list – id list of parent departments
Return parent_ids:
 

list of parent ids.
get_user_departments(userid)[source]¶

get all departments of given user.

Parameters:userid – user id.
Return parent_list:
 user’s departments.
update(dept_id, **kwargs)[source]¶

udpate department.

Parameters:
  • dept_id – the department id which to update.
  • name – department name
  • language – language of department.
  • parent_id – parent department id, default 1 root department.
  • hide_dept – whether hide the department
  • dept_permits – who can view the department, limit 200 departments.
  • user_permits – who can view the department, limit 200 persons.
  • outer_dept – restrict members of this department from viewing the address book.
  • outer_dept_only_self – whether members of this department can only see the address book of their department and subordinate departments
  • outer_permit_users – specify the userid list of address book users that the members of this department can view, the total cannot exceed 200
  • outer_permit_depts – specify a list of department IDs in the address book that members of this department can view, the total number cannot exceed 200
  • create_dept_group – whether to create an enterprise group associated with this department
  • order – for the sort value in the parent department, the lower order value is sorted first
  • source_identifier – department identification field, developers can use this field to uniquely identify a department and map it with the department in the external address book of DingDing
  • auto_add_user – whether auto add user into group when user been added to department.
  • dept_manager_userid_list – update manager list of department
  • group_contain_sub_dept – whether has child department.
  • group_contain_outer_dept – whether has outside department
  • group_contain_hidden_dept – whether has hide department.
  • org_dept_owner – the host of group.
Return result:

True or False
